li.a: Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (FERPA)

span.strong: Envision Science Academy is closed to students through Friday, May 15.
The office will be open on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 9 am to 12 pm
and closed on Monday, Wednesday and Friday every week.
We will be accepting food donations when the office is open.

div.p: Envision Science Academy is a K-8 STEAM public charter school that provides tuition-free education to all North Carolina students. Our mission is to provide innovative instruction through experiential learning with a focus on science, technology, engineering, arts, and mathematics (STEAM) in order to prepare elementary and middle school students to compete, lead, and excel in the global marketplace. Our vision is, by engaging in project based learning, students will be prepared to pursue STEAM related careers and become lifelong learners.

span.em: Stimulate the whole mind. Educate the whole child.

div.p: With more of your family at home all day, not knowing how long this pandemic will last, and the potential of family members getting laid off, furloughed, or otherwise experiencing a reduction in income, having food at home may start becoming a challenge for your...

img.div: Darlene Smith Godsey Please let me know if the school needs donations in order to sustain the program. We will help how we can. Thank you!

strong.span: Support the Athletic Fields Soaring Eagle Campaign!

hr.p: Please consider contributing to the Soaring Eagle Campaign. The campaign will help to fund the construction of Envision’s athletic fields (2 soccer fields, 4 tennis courts and multi-use open space). The goal for this campaign is $100,000. These exciting additions to Envision’s campus will enhance our students’ sports programs and provide venues to improve physical, mental and behavioral health. Please consider contributing to Envision Science Academy’s Soaring Eagle Campaign. You can donate online, by mail, or stop by the front office. Click here for more information.
The 2020-2021 lottery enrollment period has closed. To find out how to be added to our waiting list please go here. To view the lottery results go here.
The 2019-2021 Two-Year School Calendar is now available. Click the icon above to view. It can also be found on our Calendars page.
